outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 320
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorHeader.comment: The color of the header text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorThermometerUnfilled.comment: The color for the unfilled portion of the thermometer expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorThermometerOutline.comment: The color to outline the thermometer expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorThermometerBar.comment: The color to fill the thermometer when normal range expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorThermomaterBarWarn.comment: The color to fill the thermometer when warn range expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorThermometerBarHot.comment: The color to fill the thermometer when exceeding hot range expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieOutline.comment: The color to outline the pie charts used for disk space expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieEmpty.comment: The color to fill the area of the pie chart for free disk space expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieEmptyText.comment: The color for labels in the pie chart for free disk space expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieGood.comment: The color to fill the area of the pie chart for used disk space expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieGoodText.comment: The color for labels in the pie chart for used disk space expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieWarn.comment: The color to fill the area of the pie chart for used disk space when in warning status expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieWarnText.comment: The color for the labels in the pie chart for used disk space when in warning status expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieDanger.comment: The color to fill the area of the pie chart for used disk space when in danger status expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieDangerText.comment: The color for labels in the pie chart for used disk space when in danger status expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorPieLabelText.comment: The color for the title label of the pie chart for disk space expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorCPUOutline.comment: The color to outline the CPU meters expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorCPUEmpty.comment: The color to fill in CPU meters for unused processing load expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorCPUGood.comment: The color to fill in CPU meters for normal processing load expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorCPUWarn.comment: The color to fill in CPU meters for warn levels of processing load expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorCPUDanger.comment: The color to fill in CPU meters for danger levels of processing load expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorCPULabelText.comment: The color of the labels for the CPU meters expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMEMOutline.comment: The color to outline the memory arc display expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMEMEmpty.comment: The color to fill the memory arc for unused/free memory expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMEMGood.comment: The color to fill the memory arc for used memory in the normal range expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMEMWarn.comment: The color to fill the memory arc for used memory in the warning range expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMEMDanger.comment: The color to fill the memory arc for used memory when in the danger rnage expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorMEMLabelText.comment: The color of the labels for the memory arc displays expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
